#summary Release notes

== ClearParser v0.3 ==

 * Clear semantic role labeler is added.
 * Clear prop-to-dep analyzer is added.

== ClearParser v0.2 ==

 * The shift-pop algorithm is added.

== ClearParser v0.1 ==

 * Clear dependency parser, using the shift-eager algorithm, is added.
 * Clear penn-to-dep converter is added.
 * Clear morphological analyzer is added.
